title: Vivek Batra
description: Vivek Barta is a news application which provides news details on several topics like entertainment, sports, history, geography, local news and many more.

title: Chess Master
description: Chess Master is designed to make chess accessible and enjoyable for everyone, whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned grandmaster. With regular updates, interactive lessons, and a global community, Chess Master is the perfect app to refine your skills and experience the thrill of chess.

title: Dare Roulette
description: Spice up your gatherings with Dare Roulette! Spin the wheel to reveal exciting Truth or Dare challenges, perfect for friends, family, and parties. With endless fun questions and daring tasks, Dare Roulette is your ultimate game for laughter and unforgettable moments. Are you ready to take on the challenge? Spin now!

title: Healofy
description: Healofy is for Indian Babies, Moms & Pregnant Moms. From pregnancy week by week tracker, pregnancy calendar to breastfeeding, pregnancy tips in Hindi, Malayalam. Baby tips, baby care tips, parenting tips, baby health, kick counter to baby growth, fatigue, nausea, nausea meaning, white discharge, frequent urination, heartburn, acid reflux, tumbler, tired, baby vaccination chart to baby food recipes, pregnancy calculator to pregnancy yoga, potty training, ultrasound pics, baby vegetables to baby sleep, breastfeeding & baby toys or femzy products & more from femzy. Range of products by Femzy & Baby Story.

title: WeCopyTrade
description: WeCopyTrade is a platform or service that allows individuals to copy the trades of experienced traders. It is a form of social trading where less experienced traders can benefit from the knowledge and expertise of more seasoned traders by replicating their trading strategies and actions.

title: Miabigado
description: This application belongs to Consumer Law Group, a Spanish speaking Illinois based law firm focused on protecting the right of the immigrants. This application educates the immigrants about their rights Application also allows the user to share their location with loved ones in case of arrest.

title: MyJubilant
description: Build corporate app for employees under the name of MyJubilant, with this App employees can perform all the major tasks of various applications without logging into multiple applications such as ERP, CRM, HR etc.

title: NotNul

title: Vkeel Find Advocate | Lawyer
description: Vkeel Android App is a platform where you can search Lawyers of your city/locality or from all over the country. Users can ask questions, receive answers and suggestions from Advocates.

title: Cricduel
description: A fantasy league app. People can create his/her own team and can participate in different types of leagues.

title: Liebigs Tracking App
description: Liebigs Tracking App is an application is for internal users of Liebigs Agro Chem Pvt Ltd to work in remote area under the company supervision. This app helps users to check on their daily travel activity, attendance and helps them in travelling allowances.
